name: The Joker's doors
description:
The Joker's doors is a game I made during the 2018 Christmas holidays. I wanted to create a game during a short amount of time, and I initially planned to do a more simple game, but I liked the idea of making a puzzle game, which I never did before.

The game will take you into a pixel art world, where you will have to learn and master a few mechanics, but above all think about how you will be able to complete the levels, by collecting all the symbols !

I am still working on the game and will probably end its production after creating a few new levels and maybe change some things. Make sure to give me your opinion on the game, ask me if there's anything you want to know, and report me bugs or any problem you might have while playing !

CONTROLS :

Movement : AD / QD / Left & Right arrows

Jump : W / Z / Space / Up arrow

Interaction : E / Enter

The music is from the HeatleyBros YouTube Channel.
